Articles.Content:
Am I the only one that has a specific pattern when the game loads?

Like, I have it first loads like halfway slowly, then it makes huge leaps and finishes the rest of the loading in approx. 5 seconds.

P.S. I didn't know where to put this, so I put it here

Yep. It goes fairly quickly, then slows down for like 20-45 seconds, then just shoots the rest of the way as soon as it hits the halfway point.

Every time.
I belive the first half is loading the part, and then the second half is the compiling part.
I like it when it takes 3 hours to load the first part and 20 minutes to load the other half.

I like it when it takes 3 hours to load the first part and 20 minutes to load the other half.

Ehm, does it seriously take that long? Impressive!

I like it when it takes 3 hours to load the first part and 20 minutes to load the other half.

How many mods do you have in it, all of them?
the loading screens do pop up on a frequent basis. i think there may be a pattern involving the amount of times i start the game and the amount of loading screens i encounter but i can't be sure.
In the second part, it does not make huge leaps. Instead, your framerate is going down to about 2 while it's compiling the parts.

In the second part, it does not make huge leaps. Instead, your framerate is going down to about 2 while it's compiling the parts.

For the visual effect that it is making huge leaps
